places.review: Tasty food; good drinks and a very nice service.
Tempat nongkrong dengan outdoor seating ditaman dan live musik sambil menikmati kopi yg berkualitas.
Coffees, teas, and regular selection of western and local foods

places.sponsor: Kopi Luwak Roast House and Cafe
places.review: Brilliant place lovely staff well priced food and drink.
Amazing food, good service and good atmosphere to sit.
